head.title: Support cssnano's development
head.description: cssnano is a MIT licensed open source project and therefore completely free to use; however development of new features & ongoingâ€¦

body:
cssnano is a MIT licensed open source project and therefore completely free to use; however development of new features & ongoing maintenance work is not sustainable without financial backing. Please help us to stay independent and support us!

You can support us through Patreon as an ongoing commitment, or one-time through PayPal.

#Patreon Backers

A huge THANK YOU to our recurring backers!

  • Jake Hickenlooper
  • Tommy Hodgins

#Stickers

We sell logo stickers through StickerMule.
